p: Pre-treatment with the phenolic-rich extract of red onion peels (100 and 500 mg/kg) against oxidative stress induced by carbon tetrachloride (CCl 4) free radicals in rat liver and kidney, ameliorated tissue levels of malondialdehyde (MDA) and significantly reduced the net carrageenan-induced edoema in the paw of rats (Ahmed et al. 2017).
